name: collection_constants
desc: Pre-defined collection mapping constants for common RDF collection strategies.

name: rdfAlt
desc: Maps Dart collections to RDF Alternative structures (first is preferred).

name: rdfBag
desc: Maps Dart collections to RDF Bag structures (unordered collections).

name: rdfList
desc: Maps Dart collections to RDF List structures (rdf:first/rdf:rest/rdf:nil).

name: rdfSeq
desc: Maps Dart collections to RDF Sequence structures (rdf:_1, rdf:_2, rdf:_3...).

name: unorderedItems
desc: Maps Dart Iterable collections to multiple separate triples.

name: unorderedItemsList
desc: Maps Dart List collections to multiple separate triples.

name: unorderedItemsSet
desc: Maps Dart Set collections to multiple separate triples.

name: rdf_mapper_annotations
desc: Annotation library for mapping Dart classes to RDF graphs.

name: BaseMapping
desc: Base class for all mapping configurations that share common mapper functionality.

name: BaseMapping.mapper
desc: Creates a reference to a mapper that will be instantiated from the given type.

name: BaseMapping.mapperInstance
desc: Creates a reference to a directly provided mapper instance.

name: BaseMapping.namedFactory
desc: Creates a reference to a named factory function for creating mappers.

name: BaseMapping.namedMapper
desc: Creates a reference to a named mapper that will be injected at runtime.

name: BaseMapping.new
desc: Creates a base resource mapping with the specified class IRI and mapper configuration.

name: mapper
desc: Provides a MapperRef if a custom mapper is specified.

name: direction
desc: Specifies whether this mapper should handle serialization, deserialization, or both.

name: registerGlobally
desc:
Controls whether the generated mapper should be registered globally
in the initRdfMapper function.

name: CollectionMapping
desc: Configures mapping details for collection properties in RDF.

name: CollectionMapping.auto
desc: Creates automatic collection mapping behavior.

name: CollectionMapping.fromRegistry
desc: Creates registry-based collection mapping.

name: CollectionMapping.mapper
desc: Creates a reference to a collection mapper that will be instantiated from the given type.

name: CollectionMapping.mapperInstance
desc: Creates a reference to a directly provided collection mapper instance.

name: CollectionMapping.namedMapper
desc: Creates a reference to a named collection mapper that will be injected at runtime.

name: CollectionMapping.withItemMappers
desc: Creates a reference to a collection mapper that will be instantiated from the given type.

name: ContextualMapping
desc: Configuration for contextual property mapping.

name: ContextualMapping.namedProvider
desc: Creates a named contextual mapping configuration.

name: GlobalResourceMapping
desc: Configures mapping details for global resources (resources with IRIs) at the property level.

name: GlobalResourceMapping.mapper
desc: Creates a reference to a mapper that will be instantiated from the given type.

name: GlobalResourceMapping.mapperInstance
desc: Creates a reference to a directly provided mapper instance.

name: GlobalResourceMapping.namedMapper
desc: Creates a reference to a named mapper that will be injected at runtime.

name: IriMapping
desc: Configures mapping details for IRI terms in RDF at the property level.

name: IriMapping.mapper
desc: Creates a reference to a mapper that will be instantiated from the given type.

name: IriMapping.mapperInstance
desc: Creates a reference to a directly provided mapper instance for this IRI term.

name: IriMapping.namedFactory
desc: Creates a reference to a named factory function for creating IRI mappers.

name: IriMapping.namedMapper
desc: Creates a reference to a named mapper for this IRI term.

name: IriMapping.new
desc: Creates an IRI mapping template for property-specific IRI generation.

name: IriMapping.withFragment
desc: Creates a mapping for generating IRIs by appending a fragment to a base IRI.

name: fragmentTemplate
desc: Optional template for the fragment identifier to append to the base IRI.

name: template
desc: An optional template string for constructing the IRI.

name: IriStrategy
desc: Defines the strategy for generating IRIs for RDF resources.

name: IriStrategy.mapper
desc: Creates a reference to a mapper that will be instantiated from the given type.

name: IriStrategy.mapperInstance
desc: Creates a reference to a directly provided mapper instance for this IRI term.

name: IriStrategy.namedFactory
desc: Creates a reference to a named factory function for creating IRI mappers.

name: IriStrategy.namedMapper
desc: Creates a reference to a named mapper for this IRI strategy.

name: IriStrategy.new
desc: Creates a strategy for generating IRIs from resource properties.

name: IriStrategy.withFragment
desc: Creates a strategy for generating IRIs by appending a fragment to a base IRI.

name: fragmentTemplate
desc: Optional template for the fragment identifier to append to the base IRI.

name: providedAs
desc: Optional name under which this resource's IRI will be provided to dependent mappers.

name: template
desc: An optional template string for constructing IRIs from resource properties.

name: LiteralContent
desc: Represents the content for building an RDF Literal.

name: LiteralContent.new
desc: Creates content for a literal that will be combined with a datatype.

name: LiteralContent.withLanguage
desc: Creates content for a language-tagged string literal.

name: LiteralMapping
desc: Configures mapping details for literal values in RDF at the property level.

name: LiteralMapping.mapper
desc: Creates a reference to a mapper that will be instantiated from the given type.

name: LiteralMapping.mapperInstance
desc:
Creates a reference to a directly provided mapper instance for this literal
term.

name: LiteralMapping.namedMapper
desc: Creates a reference to a named mapper for this literal term.

name: LiteralMapping.withLanguage
desc: Specifies a language tag for string literals at the property level.

name: LiteralMapping.withType
desc: Specifies a custom datatype for literal values.

name: LocalResourceMapping
desc: Configures mapping details for local resources (blank nodes) at the property level.

name: LocalResourceMapping.mapper
desc: Creates a reference to a mapper that will be instantiated from the given type.

name: LocalResourceMapping.mapperInstance
desc:
Creates a reference to a directly provided mapper instance for this local
resource.

name: LocalResourceMapping.namedMapper
desc: Creates a reference to a named mapper that will be injected at runtime.

name: MapperDirection
desc: Specifies whether a mapper should handle serialization, deserialization, or both.

name: values
desc: A constant List of the values in this enum, in order of their declaration.

name: MapperRef
desc: Base class for type-safe mapper references.

name: MapperRef.new
desc: Creates a mapper reference with optional injection configuration.

name: factoryConfigInstance
desc: The configuration instance to pass to the factory function, if any.

name: factoryName
desc:
The name to use for the factory parameter in the generated initRdfMapper
method. Enables dependency injection of factory functions that create mappers.

name: instance
desc:
A direct mapper instance to be used. Allows for pre-configured mapper
instances with specific behaviors.

name: name
desc:
The name to use for the mapper parameter in the generated initRdfMapper
method. Enables dependency injection of specific mapper instances.

name: type
desc:
The Type of the mapper to instantiate. The generator will create an
instance of this type at runtime.

name: RdfAnnotation
desc: Base annotation interface for RDF mapper generation.

name: RdfEnumValue
desc: Annotation for customizing how individual enum constants are serialized in RDF.

name: RdfEnumValue.new
desc: Creates an annotation that customizes the serialization value for an enum constant.

name: value
desc: Custom value to use when serializing this enum constant.

name: RdfGlobalResource
desc: Marks a Dart class as an RDF resource with a global IRI.

name: RdfGlobalResource.deserializeOnly
desc: Creates an annotation for deserialization-only mapping.

name: RdfGlobalResource.mapper
desc: Creates a reference to a mapper that will be instantiated from the given type.

name: RdfGlobalResource.mapperInstance
desc: Creates a reference to a directly provided mapper instance.

name: RdfGlobalResource.namedMapper
desc: Creates a reference to a named mapper for this global resource.

name: RdfGlobalResource.new
desc:
Creates an annotation for a class whose instances will be mapped to RDF
subjects with specific IRIs.

name: RdfGlobalResource.serializeOnly
desc: Creates an annotation for serialization-only mapping.

name: classIri
desc: The RDF class IRI for this resource.

name: iri
desc: The IriStrategy annotation specifying how the IRI for this resource is constructed.

name: RdfIri
desc: Marks a Dart class or enum as representing an RDF IRI term.

name: RdfIri.mapper
desc: Creates a reference to a mapper that will be instantiated from the given type.

name: RdfIri.mapperInstance
desc: Creates a reference to a directly provided mapper instance for this IRI term.

name: RdfIri.namedMapper
desc: Creates a reference to a named mapper for this IRI term.

name: RdfIri.new
desc: Creates an annotation for a class or enum to be mapped to an IRI term.

name: RdfIri.withFragment
desc: Creates an IRI mapping by appending a fragment to a base IRI.

name: fragmentTemplate
desc: Optional template for the fragment identifier to append to the base IRI.

name: template
desc: An optional template string for constructing the IRI.

name: RdfIriPart
desc: Marks a property as a part of the IRI for the enclosing class.

name: RdfIriPart.new
desc: Creates an IRI part annotation with a given name.

name: RdfIriPart.position
desc: Creates an IRI part annotation with a given position.

name: name
desc:
The name of the IRI part. This corresponds to a named template variable
in the RdfIri template (e.g., id for {id}).

name: pos
desc:
The positional index of the IRI part, used when the IRI is constructed
from multiple unnamed parts, typically for record types in custom mappers.

name: RdfLanguageTag
desc: Marks a property as providing the language tag for RDF literals.

name: RdfLiteral
desc: Marks a Dart class or enum as representing an RDF literal term.

name: RdfLiteral.custom
desc: Creates an annotation for a class using custom methods for literal conversion.

name: RdfLiteral.mapper
desc: Creates a reference to a mapper that will be instantiated from the given type.

name: RdfLiteral.mapperInstance
desc:
Creates a reference to a directly provided mapper instance for this literal
term.

name: RdfLiteral.namedMapper
desc: Creates a reference to a named mapper for this literal term.

name: RdfLiteral.new
desc: Creates an annotation for a class or enum to be mapped to a literal term.

name: fromLiteralTermMethod
desc:
Optional static method name to use for converting a LiteralTerm back to
the object type.

name: toLiteralTermMethod
desc: Optional method name to use for converting the object to a LiteralTerm.

name: RdfLocalResource
desc: Marks a Dart class as a local RDF resource (referred to via a blank node).

name: RdfLocalResource.mapper
desc: Creates a reference to a mapper that will be instantiated from the given type.

name: RdfLocalResource.mapperInstance
desc:
Creates a reference to a directly provided mapper instance for this local
resource.

name: RdfLocalResource.namedMapper
desc: Creates a reference to a named mapper for this local resource.

name: RdfLocalResource.new
desc:
Creates an annotation for a class whose instances will be mapped to RDF
blank nodes.

name: classIri
desc: The RDF class IRI for this blank node.

name: RdfMapEntry
desc: Specifies the Dart Type that represents each entry in a Map.

name: RdfMapEntry.new
desc: Creates a new RdfMapEntry annotation with the specified item class.

name: itemClass
desc: The Dart Type that defines the structure for each entry in the Map.

name: RdfMapKey
desc: Designates a property as the key in a mapped Map<K,V> collection.

name: RdfMapValue
desc: Designates a property or class as the value in a mapped Map<K,V> collection.

name: RdfProperty
desc: Maps a Dart class property to an RDF predicate.

name: RdfProperty.new
desc: Creates an RDF property mapping annotation.

name: collection
desc: Specifies a custom collection mapper for handling collection properties.

name: contextual
desc: Optional contextual mapping configuration.

name: defaultValue
desc: Optional default value for this property.

name: globalResource
desc: Specifies how to treat the property's value as an RDF resource with its own IRI.

name: include
desc: Whether to include this property during serialization to RDF.

name: includeDefaultsInSerialization
desc: Whether to include properties with default values during serialization.

name: iri
desc: Specifies how to treat the property's value as an IRI reference.

name: itemType
desc: Explicitly specifies the item type for collection mapping.

name: literal
desc: Specifies custom literal conversion for the property value.

name: localResource
desc: Specifies how to treat the property's value as a nested anonymous resource.

name: predicate
desc: The RDF predicate (IRI) for this property, e.g., SchemaBook.name.

name: RdfProvides
desc:
Marks a property as providing a named value that can be referenced in
IRI templates in the RDF mapping system.

name: RdfProvides.new
desc: Creates an annotation that provides a value to be used in IRI templates.

name: name
desc: The name by which this provided value can be referenced in IRI templates.

name: RdfUnmappedTriples
desc: Marks a property to capture and preserve unmapped RDF triples during lossless mapping.

name: RdfUnmappedTriples.new
desc: Creates an @RdfUnmappedTriples annotation.

name: globalUnmapped
desc: Whether to collect unmapped triples from the entire graph instead of just this subject.

name: RdfValue
desc:
Marks a property within a class as the primary value source for RDF literal
conversion.

name: RdfValue.new
desc: Marks a property as the value source for RDF serialization.
